p: Therefore, in both processes, the amounts of chemical compounds in essential oils did not vary significantly with the values of the findings of other reports. Increasing pressure and reducing time had also no significant effect on Consists of chemical family and non-oxygenated and oxygenated fractions of orange peels essential oils obtained by both methods. Essential oils obtained whether by hydro-distillation or steam explosion of orange peel had a quality quite close. On the other hand, Limonene is the major component with a percentage of 77.39% and 100% respectively for hydro-distillation and steam explosion essential oils (Figs. 8 and 9).
